description: [BitCoin](http://bitcoin.org/en/) is a digital currency, a protocol, and a software that enables it. Decentralized crypto-currency
ohloh_description: Bitcoin is a decentralized P2P electronic cash system without a central server or trusted parties. Users hold the crypto keys to their own money and transact directly with each other, with the help of the network to check for double-spending.
name: Bitcoin
